TextView.android:text:
Each shortcut references one or more intents, each of which launches a specific action in your app when users select the shortcut. Examples of actions you can express as shortcuts include the following:

1. Navigating users to a particular location in a mapping app.
2. Sending messages to a friend in a communication app.
3. Playing the next episode of a TV show in a media app.
4. Loading the last save point in a gaming app
